de.dhohmann.bukkit.craft.listeners

Interface GodLike

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener, Unbreakable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GodAxe, GodPickaxe, GodShears, GodShovel

    public interface GodLike
extends Unbreakable

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEMIGOD
      Determines items that should not break and can only be used for suiting blocks
      static int GODLIKE
      Determines items that should not break and can be used for every block
      static int NORMAL
      Determines items that work as normal items

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void onItemUse(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent e)
      This method is called, when the user clicks on an entity or a block.

    • Method Detail

      • onItemUse

        void onItemUse(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent e)
        This method is called, when the user clicks on an entity or a block. Use this method to manipulate the clicked entity or block.
        • To check the action type use: e.getAction() == Action.LEFT_CLICK_AIR
        Parameters:
        e - Event holding information about the player and the block
